meanings.sent1: The courier redelivers the package to the customer.
meanings.sent2: She redelivers the lost items to their owners.
meanings.sent3: The magician redelivers the vanished rabbit with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: The teacher redelivers knowledge to her students like a precious gift.
meanings.sent5: The postman redelivers the misplaced letter with a smile.

meanings.sent1: He redelivers the borrowed book to the library.
meanings.sent2: The kind neighbor redelivers the borrowed tools promptly.
meanings.sent3: She redelivers the mistakenly taken umbrella to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The honest person redelivers the lost wallet to its rightful owner.
meanings.sent5: The responsible student redelivers the borrowed notes after class.

meanings.definition: To return something to its original recipient
meanings.sent1: The post office redelivers the undelivered package to the sender.
meanings.sent2: The company redelivers the faulty product to the manufacturer.
meanings.sent3: The restaurant redelivers the wrong order to the correct table.
meanings.sent4: The courier redelivers the misplaced keys to the forgetful owner.
meanings.sent5: The delivery person redelivers the missing package to the waiting customer.
